item.title: Crossfeed VALVE Light – Single VALVE Installation

remarks.para: Except for ER operations, may be inoperative provided:

numlitem.para: Crossfeed valve is verified to be operative, and
Both main fuel quantity indications are operative.

placard.para: Placard Crossfeed VALVE Light "LIGHT INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: Open main gear doors and install door locks.

warning.para: REFER TO MAINTENANCE MANUAL 32-00-15 FOR LOCK INSTALLATION. RAPID ACTION OF DOORS MAY CAUSE INJURY OR DAMAGE IF LOCKS ARE NOT PROPERLY INSTALLED.

numlitem.para: Gain access to the crossfeed valve actuator. The actuator is located on the aft face of the rear spar in the left wheel well. Position an observer on an elevated platform as required.
Cancel all EICAS messages from upper EICAS display.

At the fuel control panel on the overhead flight deck panel, position the CROSSFEED valve switch ON (bar in view). Wait 10 seconds. Verify "CROSSFEED VALVE" message is not displayed. Position the CROSSFEED valve switch to OFF (bar not in view). Wait 10 seconds. Verify "CROSSFEED VALVE" message is not displayed.
In wheel well, observe that valve actuator manual override lever moves from closed position to open then back to closed.
Repeat step 6 several times to confirm valve operation.
As necessary, remove elevated platform and doors locks. Close main gear doors.
